unnormalised: Interesting transfer window so far. Will Mumbai FC's acquisition of young talent from the I-League pay off? Reminds me of "Chak De! India" – hoping for similar underdog success. Also, Rs. 50 Lakh fee for Sharma seems steep. Can he justify it, especially with the pressure of playing at the Salt Lake Stadium? I expect some fireworks. Date: 2024-07-26.
normalised: Interesting transfer window so far. Will Mumbai F C's acquisition of young talent from the I League pay off? Reminds me of "Chak De! India" – hoping for similar underdog success. Also, rupee five million fee for Sharma seems steep. Can he justify it, especially with the pressure of playing at the Salt Lake Stadium? I expect some fireworks. Date: twenty sixth july two thousand and twenty four.
